Austria Classic Hotel Wolfinger

Hauptplatz 19, 4020, Linz, Austria
The Austria Classic Hotel Wolfinger is a traditional family-run hotel. We are proud of the long tradition of our hotel, which was first mentioned 500 years ago! In 1996 we were awarded a prize for the renovation of our hotel, which is under a preservation order. The hotel offers 45 guest rooms with bath/WC, cable TV and telephone. The hotel's facilities include conference rooms for up to 20 persons, elevator and a garage. Pets are welcome. Read more >>>
